description: This file implements functions for managing a Voice Service table within a telephony voice management system. It includes functions for querying, updating, and validating voice service entries, as well as retrieving various parameters related to voice service instances, such as IP address family, interface name, and status. The file contains logic for synchronization, parameter access, and manipulation of voice service data structures.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_IsUpdated(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Checks whether the voice service table has been updated. Here it always returns TRUE indicating no specific check.

methods.name: ULONG VoiceService_Synchronize(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Synchronizes the voice service table; here it returns 0 indicating success without specific synchronization logic.

methods.name: ULONG VoiceService_GetEntryCount(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Returns the count of voice service entries by accessing the linked data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE VoiceService_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,ULONG nIndex,ULONG * pInsNumber)
methods.description: Retrieves a handle to a specific voice service entry based on index, locking and unlocking data structures accordingly.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_GetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG * puLong)
methods.description: Retrieves a ULONG parameter value for a voice service, such as status or enable flag, based on parameter name.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_SetParamUlongValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,ULONG uValue)
methods.description: Sets a ULONG parameter value for a voice service, such as enabling/disabling, based on parameter name.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value for a voice service, such as factory reset or ongoing emergency call.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter for a voice service, like disabling loop current or triggering factory reset.

methods.name: ULONG VoiceService_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pulSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters such as IP address family, interface name, or alias.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets string parameters such as interface name, IP address family, or alias.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_Validate(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Validates the current state of a voice service instance before committing changes. Always returns TRUE.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_Commit(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Commits the changes to the voice service instance. Here it does nothing and returns 0.

methods.name: BOOL VoiceService_Rollback(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext)
methods.description: Rolls back any changes to the voice service instance. Here it does nothing and returns 0.

ctags.name: VoiceService_GetEntry
ctags.pattern: /^ANSC_HANDLE VoiceService_GetEntry(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, ULONG nIndex, ULONG* pInsNumber)$/

ctags.name: VoiceService_GetParamStringValue
ctags.pattern: /^ULONG VoiceService_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext, char* ParamName, char* pValue, U/
